attributes.title: Heck no
attributes.review: This app glitches locks me out of my phone plays trumps voice at night wakes me up with his stupid voice in my alarm do not get this app he wants to spy on you

attributes.title: America needs to be great again...
attributes.review: But it won’t ever happen if this clown stays in the WH.  This app requires a cell number to get information, can’t trust that either!  Controlling much?

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is trash. It glitched orange so bad that it caused my brother who was sitting next to me to have an epileptic seizure and he died. This app has ruined my life. Please apple, delete it so that no one else looses a family member
Made my phone glitch had to get a new one and it started to track everything i did kinda weird don’t recommend ‼️

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Took a month to download. Glitches all the time. Makes my phone glitch. Hateful and harmful app. Wayyy to many pictures of ugly people it definitely disturbed me. The worst app on the planet. Xoxo 😜✌️

attributes.title: Why me!!!
attributes.review: This app makes my phone glitch so bad I think I got hacked. People keep calling me. And everything is fake news why me. I have. Nothing else Cheeto man is making me upset

attributes.title: It’s horrible
attributes.review: It took weeks to work and it glitches all the time and it drains almost all my battery this app is terrible

attributes.title: This thing tried to get my information
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app just to see what it was and yes true my name birthdate and phone number do not get this app it’s dangerous 😡😖

attributes.title: broke my phone
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch and I wasn’t able to turn on my phone for days!! don’t get this app!

attributes.title: Waste of my time
attributes.review: I got this app to find reasons to vote for this 🍊 of a president and it did absolutely nothing trump has made so many promises that he has yet to fulfill and on top of that he’s a rapist and a racist girl bye 👋 😑 Danny DeVito 2020
